# Government Tender Announcement: Pulse Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Instruments

**Reference Number:** WS3919712501
**Publication Date:** June 30, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

The Canadian Grain Commission's Grain Research Laboratory is seeking bids from qualified suppliers for the supply, delivery, installation, and training of two (2) pulse nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) instruments. The instruments must be capable of determining the oil content and moisture content of oilseed samples according to ISO 10565:1998.

**Key Requirements:**

* The instruments must allow for simultaneous determination of oil content and moisture content of oilseed samples.
* The system must be capable of measuring the oil content of oilseeds and oilseed meals using a minimum of 25 g of oilseeds, as well as small sample sizes.
* Installation must be completed within 15 days of receipt of the instrument.
* Delivery is required within 5 to 6 weeks after the bid is awarded.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender opportunity is open to contractors compliant with the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Bids are open to contractors willing to operate in the following regions:

* British Columbia
* Manitoba

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Jenkinson, Lorraine (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

To access the tender opportunity, please visit the SAP Ariba website at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16731424.

**Please Note:**
All bids must be submitted by August 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
